comments.body: You need to add `gpgcheck: no` for the assertion below to pass.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +189,193 @@    description: EPEL yum repo
    baseurl: https://download.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/{{ ansible_distribution_major_version }}/{{ ansible_architecture }}/
    state: present
    gpgcheck: no
